title: Question Generation Strategies During Learning: Inquiry-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language proficiency and foundational job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: A practical project environment for enhancing language job skills. Learners can collaborate in real-time and share resources using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more purpose/function-related questions from business documents containing science/history texts.
Learners can construct five or more situationally appropriate requests for additional information to enhance text comprehension.
Learners can revise questioning strategies based on peer feedback and apply them three or more times in final project reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
